channel.title: Overflow!
channel.description:
Well i was trying to add a custom GFX... But everything compiled correctly but...
When i logged into my server and did the emote my client froze and this showed up
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.RuntimeException: buffer overflow! at Class42_Sub1.method561(Class42_Sub1.java:475) at client.method57(client.java:2716) at client.method7(client.java:1995) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:118) at client.run(client.java:4681) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: Overflow!
item.dc:creator: @Mrs_Extro_Limited Mrs Extro Limited
item.description:
@Mrs_Extro_Limited wrote:

Lol the “buffer overflow”
when your server is receiving information from another server in this case the client it is stored into a buffer.
so therefore you have a buffer overflow.
Understand now?

Read full topic
